Package controller

Class customersController

java.lang.Object
controller.customersController
public class customersController extends Object
This class is the controller responsible for the Customers Controller(customers.fxml)

    private void
    initialize()
    The initialize method attempts to create a list of all Countries as Country objects from the database It also attempts to create a list of all First Level Divisions as FirstLevelDivision objects from the database
    private void
    setCountryToDivision()
    Creates a hashmap that maps the Country ID to Country object Then for each FirstLevelDivision, assigns the correct Country object.
    private void
    setDivisionToCustomer()
    Creates a hashmap that maps the Division ID to it's Division object Then for each customer, sets the Division object, the Division name, as well as the Country of the Division
    private void
    UpdateCustomerAction()
    Attempts to open the Update Customer Window(updateCustomer.fxml) when the Update Customer Button is pressed If an error occurs the exception is printed and a popup is displayed.

  • Method Details

    • getAllCountries

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Country> getAllCountries()

    • getAllDivisions

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<FirstLevelDivision> getAllDivisions()

    • initialize

      private void initialize() throws SQLException
      The initialize method attempts to create a list of all Countries as Country objects from the database It also attempts to create a list of all First Level Divisions as FirstLevelDivision objects from the database
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error of reading the data from the database

    • setCountryToDivision

      private void setCountryToDivision()
      Creates a hashmap that maps the Country ID to Country object Then for each FirstLevelDivision, assigns the correct Country object.

    • setDivisionToCustomer

      private void setDivisionToCustomer()
      Creates a hashmap that maps the Division ID to it's Division object Then for each customer, sets the Division object, the Division name, as well as the Country of the Division

    • AddCustomerAction

      private void AddCustomerAction()
      Attempts to open the Add Customer Window(addcustomer.fxml) when the AddCustomer Button is pressed If an error occurs the exception is printed and a popup is displayed.

    • UpdateCustomerAction

      private void UpdateCustomerAction()
      Attempts to open the Update Customer Window(updateCustomer.fxml) when the Update Customer Button is pressed If an error occurs the exception is printed and a popup is displayed.

    • DeleteCustomerAction

      public void DeleteCustomerAction()
      Attempts to delete the selected customer, a popup is first displayed to double check the user wants this action. All appointments with this customer are first deleted, the customer is then deleted from the list of all customers, the customer is removed from the database, finally the Customers Table is updated. If an error occurs, the stack trace is printed.

    • deleteAllAppointments

      private void deleteAllAppointments(Customer customer)
      Deletes all appointments associated with this customer from the appointment list, and then the database
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer that the user wants to delete from the database is passed into this method

    • deleteAppointmentFromDatabase

      private void deleteAppointmentFromDatabase(Appointment appointment) throws SQLException
      Attempts to delete the appointment from the APPOINTMENTS table in the database
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment object is passed in after finding a matching customer id with the customer that will be deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error in deleting the appointment from the database

    • deleteFromDatabase

      private void deleteFromDatabase(Customer customer) throws SQLException
      Attempts to delete the customer from the CUSTOMERS table in the database
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer object that is selected is passed in.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error in deleting the customer from the database

    • deleteFromList

      private void deleteFromList(Customer customer)
      Attempts to delete the customer from the Customers list.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer object that is selected is passed in.

    • CloseButtonAction

      private void CloseButtonAction()
      Closes the Customer window.
